description: Command-line tool to interact with archive.org. More information: https://archive.org/services/docs/api/internetarchive/cli.html.

useCases.description: Configure ia with API keys (some functions won't work without this step):
Upload one or more items to archive.org:
Download one or more items from archive.org:
Delete one or more items from archive.org:
Search on archive.org, returning results as JSON:
